name: Nguyen Minh Quang
title: Data Science
bio: IT student — AI R&D (Computer Vision, Edge). Built real-time prototypes under tight deadlines; comfortable with data pipelines. Seeking CV/ML R&D internship to ship models to production on edge devices.

projects.title: Smart Helmet — HUD/IoT Safety Stack
projects.summary: Camera-based drowsiness, collision sensing, voice/SOS, real-time telemetry; defined alert criteria and latency acceptance; produced demo-ready prototype with docs and test checklists.
projects.details: Designed HUD/IoT safety stack with camera-based drowsiness and collision alerts, SOS voice & telemetry. Latency budgeted, threshold tuning, setup docs for <1h deployment.

projects.title: Hydrogen Leak Detector
projects.summary: Implemented portable H₂ leak detection with calibrated sensors, signal processing, and thresholding; created repeatable field-test procedure for industrial settings.
projects.details: Thresholding + filtering pipeline for H₂ detection. Field-test playbook; stability across industrial corridor scenarios.

projects.title: Robot Bông 2025 (Tết Deployment)
projects.summary: Contributed computer-vision/image-processing modules for AI humanoid showcased at Nguyễn Huệ Flower Street during Tết 2025.
projects.details: Vision-driven interactions for festival robot. Delivered end-to-end within a 13-member cross-functional team in <30 days. Stabilized state machine; served thousands of visitors.
